name: Hermodr (itch)
description:
Hello and Welcome to Niflheim, warrior.

"Hermodr" is an old-school fast-paced first-person shooter. No reloading, no drama, no other modern trends. Just you, your gun, and your enemies. A lot of them.
The game is implemented in the rogue-like mechanics, the levels and weapons are generated on the fly. Your task is to move forward, through the foes, deeper and deeper into the underworld. If you die, you just start all over again.
Oh, yes. Forgot about the story. This stuff is based on the Nordic folklore. You find yourself at the top level of Niflheim, and desperately want to talk to Hel. This is all you need to know about it.

The game in development, so it lacks of content and possibly have some stability issues. Updates will be available on this page. When getting a message about an update being available, simply re-download the game from this page.

At the moment only first chapter available - 2 levels and chapter boss. And arena mode of course with one level.

Contols:
WASD - movement
Mouse - view
F - melee
E - action
RMB - mini map
LMB - fire
1,2,3,4 - select weapon (if any)

System requirements:

OS: Windows 7, Ubuntu 14.04
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
Memory: 1GB RAM
Hard Drive: 200MB of free space
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT220 / ATI Radeon HD 6450 Pro or equivalent
